document.full_text: ughayyir, west bank  - jewish settlers were accused of attacking a mosque in the israeli-occupied west bank on tuesday, setting alight carpets and daubing hebrew graffiti on its walls.
document.title: palestinians accuse settlers in w.bank mosque attack
